description: Schedule 6 Application for Construction Arrangements for Systemwide works including the construction and installation of trackworks (tracks, sleepers, ballasting and concreting); the overhead catenary system; the signalling; communication and control (C&C) systems (including London West Portal Technical Building); mechanical and electrical equipment; power supply facilities and connections (including Belle Isle Feeder Station); and other ancillary works.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  Start up and close down periods of up to 2 hours (for each) are permitted for the refuelling and movement to place of work for the construction trains and directly associated preparation/close down activities only, as shown on the list below.  For all other start up and close down activities the normal period of up to 1 hour shall apply.
- Assembly/movement of personnel, donning of safety clothing etc.
- Meetings, safety briefings etc.
- Loading (food, drink etc), internal cleaning and movement of welfare train.
- Loading of SMALL items/quantities of materials and equipment e.g. tools and parts in the event that a train breaks down near the portal.
- Setting up worksites within tunnels - this would include setting out markers to prevent unauthorised movement of trains into work areas, getting materials, plant and tools into place etc.

REASON:  To preserve local amenity.
